definition[0]: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process
definition[1]: something that is automatic always happens as a result of something you have done, especially because of a rule or law
example[3]: Littering results in an automatic fine.
definition[2]: done without thinking, especially because you have done the same thing many times before
example[4]: Practise the breathing techniques until they become automatic.
definition[3]: a weapon that can fire bullets continuously
definition[4]: a car with a system of gears that operate themselves without the driver needing to change them
